messages.caption: Gune
messages.helpMe: Oh! It's so great that you have come. I was trapped here by evil Nichos. Please let me out! See that rope? Just pull it. I don't think you'll manage to do it yourself. You'll need some friends to help you
messages.missionAlreadyCompleted: Do you like the mask I gave you? I'm sure you are. Thanks again! Have fun ;)
messages.missionComplete: FREEDOM! I'm grateful to you for your help. For you to remember this day, please take Ð° small gift. I made it myself while sitting here
